keyword: how many calories in yogurt ice cream
title: How Many Calories in Yogurt Ice Cream?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in yogurt ice cream per 100g serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition breakdowns for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in Yogurt Ice Cream?
assumptions: Plain frozen yogurt (yogurt ice cream), standard commercial variety, no added toppings; assumes low-fat dairy base.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, fat content, sweeteners, and portion size. Check labels for exact values.

quick_answer.text: 100g of yogurt ice cream typically contains about 120 calories with 4g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in a serving of yogurt ice cream?
faqs.a: About 120 kcal per 100g serving of plain yogurt ice cream.

faqs.q: Is yogurt ice cream lower in calories than regular ice cream?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 100-130 kcal per 100g vs. 200+ kcal for regular ice cream.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in yogurt ice cream?
faqs.a: Around 20g carbs per 100g, mostly from sugars in the yogurt and milk.

faqs.q: How much protein does yogurt ice cream have?
faqs.a: Approximately 4g protein per 100g, from the yogurt base.

faqs.q: Does flavor affect calories in yogurt ice cream?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”fruit flavors add minimal calories, but chocolate or cookie varieties can add 20-50 kcal per 100g.
